title: Teacher Education Environment Design Through Student-Activating Pedagogies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theory and Understanding of Elementary School Curricula
context.additional_context: Learners analyze real classroom cases and experience student-centered teaching methods through self-directed inquiry activities. A collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices is structured.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of student-activation teaching methods with over 80% accuracy
Learners can develop three or more student engagement strategies through task designs reflecting real classroom situations
Learners can improve their teaching approaches two or more times based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
